name: Iris (nomad)
description:
Iris is a pensive puzzle adventure created in 48 hours for the 2014 Global Game Jam.


Credits:

Art & Design - Saam Pahlavan - @saampahlavan

Code & Design - Damon Chandler - @whirred_up

If you have trouble with the web player try another browser or click the download links below.

Watch an excellent playthrough/analysis by RockLeeSmile (aka Indie Impressions). Easter egg spoiler alert.

Thanks for playing!
